= !StdIn property =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJConsoleApp_.

*Class:* _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_.

{{{
property StdIn: THandle;
}}}

== Description ==

The _!StdIn_ property specifies a console application's standard input handle. The program will read standard input from the specified handle. Leave as 0 (the default) if standard input is not to be redirected. To redirect input set the property to a valid *inheritable* handle.
